document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the genus Aulacophora from Taiwan (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Galerucinae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aulacophora ( Ceratia ) palliata :
Laboissière, 1929
: 258
( Vietnam );
Chûjô, 1935 c
: 160
( Taiwan ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Schaller’s collection does no longer exist. It was lost in “Waisenhaus Halle”.

caption.paragraph:

, male, dorsal view; 109. Ditto, ventral view; 110.
A. palliata
, female, dorsal view; 111. Head of
A. frontalis
, male; 112. Head of
A. palliata
, male.

Diagnosis. See diagnosis of
Aulacophora frontalis
.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 113–120. Diagnostic characters of
Aulacophora palliata
(Schaller)
. 113. Antenna, male; 114. Antenna, female; 115. Penis, dorsal view; 116. Penis lateral view; 117. Gonocoxae; 118. Abdominal ventrite VIII, female; 119. Abdominal tergite VIII, male; 120. Spermatheca.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Host plants. Cucurbitaceae :
Trichosanthes cucumeroides (Ser.) Maxim. ex Fr. & Sav.
, and
T. ovigera Bl.
(present study).
Distribution. Burma , China , India , Indonesia , Malaysia , Taiwan , Vietnam .
